results.firPara: • Belgian has not recovered from the knock in game against Southampton
results.secPara: Pep Guardiola has confirmed that Kevin De Bruyne will miss Manchester Citys EFL Cup meeting on Wednesday with Manchester United at Old Trafford.
results.webTitle: Kevin De Bruyne will miss EFL Cup meeting with Manchester United

results.firPara: Walter Zenga has been sacked by Wolverhampton Wanderers only 14 games into the Championship season.
results.secPara: The club, 18th in the league, said in a statement on their website Wolves have announced Walter Zengas contract has been terminated with immediate effect. Stefano Cusin, assistant head coach, has also left the club.
results.webTitle: Wolves sack Walter Zenga after 14 games following Leeds defeat

results.firPara: The EFL Cup match on Wednesday will be the most stringent examination of policing and stewarding at West Hams London Stadium as well as evaluating the grounds ability to recreate Upton Parks atmosphere

results.firPara: West Ham United and Chelsea supporters face body searches, alcohol restrictions and post-match segregation as part of a robust policing plan aimed at minimising crowd trouble at the EFL Cup tie on Wednesday.
results.secPara: There has been trepidation surrounding the fixture ever since the draw for the fourth round was made last month given the rivalry that exists between the clubs and the fact it takes place at the London Stadium, which has been dogged by disturbances and incidents of violence following West Hams move there from Upton Park before the start of the season.
results.webTitle: West Ham take ‘robust’ steps to avoid crowd trouble against Chelsea

results.firPara: • Liverpool benefit from keeping emerging players at Anfield
results.secPara: Jürgen Klopp believes Liverpool are reaping the benefit of keeping academy prospects at the club as he considers involving Trent Alexander-Arnold and Ovie Ejaria in the EFL Cup tie against Tottenham Hotspur.
results.webTitle: Jürgen Klopp to put Liverpool young guns in firing line against Tottenham
